Sentencas: The potential of atmospheric plasma spraying (APS) technology has been investigated for the manufacture of anode, electrolyte and cathode of a solid oxide fuel cell.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: As the substrate a tape-casted FeCr alloy was used.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: It turned out that all layers can be applied by this technique, however, the APS cathode layer, although applied by suspension plasma spraying led to cells with rather low performance.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: Much better cell characteristics could be obtained by using screen-printed LSCF cathodes, which do not need any additional thermal treatment.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: Anode layers with high electrochemical activity were produced by separate injection of NiO and YSZ powders.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: The manufacturing of gastight electrolyte layers was a key-issue of the present development.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: As APS ceramic coatings typically contain microcracks and pores their leakage rate is not sufficiently low for SOFC applications.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: Based on the understanding of the formation of defects during spraying an optimized spraying process was developed which led to highly dense coatings with the appearance of a bulk, sintered ceramic.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: Open cell voltages above I V proofed the low leakage rates of the rather thin (<50 mu m) coatings.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: With these cells having a screen-printed cathode an output power of 500 MW/cm(2) could be achieved at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: It turned out that the long-term stability of the metal substrate based APS SOFCs was rather poor.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: The aging of the cells was probably due to interdiffusion of anode and substrate material.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: Hence, diffusion barrier was applied by APS between substrate and anode.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: These layers were very effective in reducing the degradation rate.
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)

Sentencas: For these cells the output power reached 800 mW/cm(2).
Titulo: Manufacturing of high performance solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with atmospheric plasma spraying (APS)
